A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The writer ruined this franchise. My wife is one of the few cool chicks who loves Star Wars. She fell asleep for half of the movie. And that was 6 pm on a Friday night. It seemed like a bunch of 12 year olds came up with the plot. Terrible writing masked by cool effects. Then they advertise as the “best Star Wars movie yet”. Who are they kidding?
